attributes.action: SSHD to reform s/322(5) of the General Immigration Rules on Tax cases
attributes.additional_details:
Number of Economic Migrants are suffering throughout the country.Affected in this are NHS doctors,Lawyers,Lecturers,IT professionals,Medical technicians,Engineers,Teachers etc.
Refusals are made under 322(5) of the General Immigration Rules- which has a very high threshold and was mainly made for terrorists/criminals.It is absolutely absurd to put law-abiding professionals in the same category.
www.theguardian.com/uk-news/2018/jan/30/skilled-migrants-protest-against-uk-visa-policies
attributes.background: Migrants who have been on Tier 1 General visa,following stringent rules have been denied settlement, alleging 'dishonesty and deceit' when the application involves a tax correction.These are past tax affairs & where any discrepancy was found by the applicant,they have been settled with HMRC.

rejection.details:
We understand that you'd like to see changes to the immigration rules, but we're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. 

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
